article: Does DoorDash Take Cash? The Complete Guide
intro: Cash used to be the only way to pay for food delivery, but the proliferation of food delivery apps like DoorDash has made it less clear if cash is still a viable payment method. So does DoorDash take cash? The short answer is no, at least not within the DoorDash app. You can pay with cash on third-party sites that use DoorDash as their delivery service. This wikiHow guide covers everything you need to know about using cash on DoorDash.

steps.title: You can always tip a Dasher with cash.
steps.subtitle: Even if you place an order through the DoorDash app and pay for it electronically, you can still greet your Dasher with a cash tip when they arrive to drop off your order.
sub-points: You can also tip your Dasher within the app.  to learn more about adjusting your tip on DoorDash.

steps.title: Select "Cash" when checking out via DoorDash Drive.
steps.subtitle: If cash is accepted, this option will appear in the list of payment methods.
sub-points: It can be difficult to know when you are going to come across a website that uses DoorDash Drive. If you are ordering pizza or another food item from a restaurant's website and you see the DoorDash interface, look for "Cash" as a payment method.
Once you check out, make sure you have the necessary amount of cash and wait for your Dasher to arrive.
Your order must be $7 or more to qualify for a cash payment. If your aren't spending as least $7, you will have to pay with a card or other electronic payment.
